channel.title: 562 help
channel.description: Okay, I;m using Atomicscape and when I am on it has server messages, what files and where do i edit them?

item.title: 562 help
item.dc:creator: @iloob iloob
item.description:
@iloob wrote:

You open up you atomic source folder and click on “src” folder then “com” folder then “rs2hd” folder then “model” folder and open up player.java file.
Search for if(serverMess > 0) and under that you will see

if(serverMess == 0 && serverMess1 == 0){ serverMess1 = 1; getActionSender().sendMessage("<col=0066ff>[SERVER]:<col=ff0033>Join Up At The AtomicScape Forums At Atomic-Scape.Tk!."); serverMess = 60; }
The line that you see the getActionSender().sendMessage is what does the server spam.

To stop it you could delete it or mark it out

/* if(serverMess > 0){ serverMess--; } if(serverMess == 0 && serverMess1 == 0){ serverMess1 = 1; getActionSender().sendMessage("<col=0066ff>[SERVER]:<col=ff0033>Join Up At The AtomicScape Forums At Atomic-Scape.Tk!."); serverMess = 60; } if(serverMess == 0 && serverMess1 == 1){ serverMess1 = 2; getActionSender().sendMessage("<col=0066ff>[SERVER]:<col=ff0033>Vote For AtmicScape On The Runelocus Status Page!."); serverMess = 60; } if(serverMess == 0 && serverMess1 == 2){ serverMess1 = 3; getActionSender().sendMessage("<col=0066ff>[SERVER]:<col=ff0033>To Use Bank Go To Graphic Option And Click On Fixed Not Resisable!."); serverMess = 60; } if(serverMess == 0 && serverMess1 == 3){ serverMess1 = 4; getActionSender().sendMessage("<col=0066ff>[SERVER]:<col=ff0033>Respect All Mods And Admins, Enjoy The Server!."); serverMess = 60; } if(serverMess == 0 && serverMess1 == 4){ serverMess1 = 0; getActionSender().sendMessage("<col=0066ff>[SERVER]:<col=ff0033>Safe Pking Home. Dangerous Pking ::Edge And ::Dragpk!."); serverMess = 60; }*/

Hope that helped.

Read full topic
